1.3.name: wordpress/comment-count-admin
1.3.description:
GERMAN:

  • Deutsche Plugin-Beschreibung auf officetrend.de

ENGLISH:

This plugin adds a handy feature to the Wordpress admin pages to allow you to quickly identify first-time commenter by comment URL. The comment count appears next to the commenters name in the "Edit Comments" listing of comments and in the "Discussion" box of the "Edit Post" page for a post with comments. Commenters are identified by the url they provided when commenting.
